m_szDocSumamry: Clean Links (More News on Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Clean Transportation, & Energy Efficiency) February 29th, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     Some more top cleantech news from the past day or so. Solar 1. We’ve written about the large solar boat known as Planetsolar many times in the past. Our good old friend Tim Hurst of Live Oak Media delved into the boats features in good depth in a recent post worth sharing, though, and also jumped into the idea of power the grid with the boat’s excess solar power when docked . 2. Michael Kuhn, President and CEO of ImagineSolar, spoke at a Solar Austin’s press
